languageKey.label: Name used to distinguish each configuration.
Domains for which this configuration should be used. Leave empty to use it with any domain.
Address or URL of the CAS server.
Port used by the CAS server.
Return URL after the the user has been logged out.
Type of LDAP server used by the authentication (OpenLDAP, Active Directory / Novell eDirectory).
Version of the protocol used by the LDAP server.
Character set used by the LDAP server. Usually: utf-8.
Address of the LDAP server.
Port used by the LDAP server. Default: 389.
DN (Distinguished Name) used to bind to the server.
E.g., cn=admin,dc=example,dc=com
Password used to bind to the server.
DN (Distinguished Name) to be used to look for BE users in the LDAP server.
E.g., ou=USERS,dc=example,dc=com
Filter to search for BE users in the LDAP server.
Sample of a filter used for the authentication: (cn={USERNAME})
Assign LDAP attribute to a field of the user record.
DN (Distinguished Name) to be used to look for BE groups in the LDAP server.
E.g., ou=GROUPS,dc=example,dc=com
Filter to search for BE groups in the LDAP server. Example: (objectClass=posixGroup)
Sample if option "Relation between groups and users" is set to "Group contains the list of its members": (memberuid={USERDN})
Assign LDAP attribute to a field of the user group.
List of backend user groups (previously imported from LDAP) required to authorize authentication of LDAP users.
List of backend user groups to be assigned automatically when authenticating LDAP users.
List of backend user groups whose members should be promoted as TYPO3 administrators (valid only as part of LDAP authentication).
DN (Distinguished Name) to be used to look for FE users in the LDAP server.
E.g., ou=USERS,dc=example,dc=com
Filter to search for FE users in the LDAP server.
Sample of a filter used for the authentication: (cn={USERNAME})
Assign LDAP attribute to a field of the user record.
DN (Distinguished Name) to be used to look for FE groups in the LDAP server.
E.g., ou=GROUPS,dc=example,dc=com
Filter to search for FE groups in the LDAP server. Example: (objectClass=posixGroup)
Sample if option "Relation between groups and users" is set to "Group contains the list of its members": (memberuid={USERDN})
Assign LDAP attribute to a field of the group record.
List of frontend user groups (previously imported from LDAP) required to authorize authentication of LDAP users.
List of frontend user groups to be assigned automatically when authenticating LDAP users.
